text.section: This chapter does not limit, prohibit, or invalidate the existence, acts, or obligations of any cooperative or association created or doing business in this Commonwealth before, on, or after July 12, 2012.
A cooperative or association formed under KRS Chapter 272, until or unless it becomes a limited cooperative association under this chapter, shall be governed by KRS Chapter 272.
The enactment of this chapter shall not impair, or otherwise affect, the organization or the continued existence of a cooperative association existing on July 12, 2012.

This chapter governs only:
A limited cooperative association formed on or after July 12, 2012; and
A cooperative or association with shares which elects, in the manner provided in its articles of incorporation or by law for amending the articles of incorporation, to be subject to this chapter.
An election pursuant to subsection (5) or (6) of this section is effective upon the effective time and date of the amended and restated articles of association as provided in KRS 14A.2-070.

law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 123, effective July 12, 2012.
